ygData.subject: Magical drums?
ygData.msgSnippet: Quick question, what lev i need to be to get the nostrolo drum (my bard is 37)? or is it simpler to just go to kedge with a 52+ group and go find the sharkskin
ygData.messageBody:
Quick question, what lev i need to be to get the nostrolo drum (my bard is
37)? or is it simpler to just go to kedge with a 52+ group and go find the
sharkskin drum? which of the 2 drums seems better (since i dont think i'll
ever get my hands on a selo's drum since the damn dragon patch)

Some guildmates were camping Phinigan for xp, kinda sad when his guards
wont even aggro when ya pull him... so i figure if they're going to kedge
for xp, i might as well hop along and hope to get a drum
